author: Duncan McRae
description: Vegetable notes with hints of orange and ginger. Healthy tasting!
name: Basilian
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber and basil in base of shaker
Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
